resources.string: No infected app found, your device looks safe!

This app features a simple way to look for application installed on your device infected with SimBad Adware.

SimBad Adware was discovered by the Check Point team (I'm NOT part of this team) in 206 applications for +150 million downloads and can do three things : Show Ads, Phishing and Exposure to other applications

This application rely on the list of infected applications published on checkpoint website. 

Note that this app only check currently installed applications, it cannot check if your were previously infected if you uninstalled the application. 

More information here : https://research.checkpoint.com/simbad-a-rogue-adware-campaign-on-google-play 

If you liked this application and want to support my work, please consider making a donation using the button below (for the price of a coffee). Thanks!
